docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 30. -- Eleven warships, 10,000 troops and forty six fighting planes are being mobilized in the Leticia region, representing the interests of three South American republics in the dispute over possession of a hitherto unheard-of...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Dec. 30. -- Eleven warships, 10,000 troops and forty six fighting planes are being mobilized in the Leticia region, representing the interests of three South American republics in the dispute over possession of a hitherto unheard-of town of 500 inhabitants hidden in the jungles of the Upper Amazon.

headline.main: AMAZON WAR ZONE TOUCHES 4 NATIONS; Brazil and Ecuador Have an Interest in Dispute of Colombia and Peru. 10,000 TROOPS GATHERING Eleven Warships and 46 Planes Also Are Being Mobilized in the Leticia Area. AMAZON WAR ZONE TOUCHES 4 NATIONS

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITE.Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES.By JOHN W. WHITE
